author: First Glance   일락
description:
Was Cinderella’s Stepsister really a villain?

A love story with the charm of a villain in a fairy tale.

When I woke up, I found myself in an unfamiliar space.
Did I drink so much that I lost consciousness? Then maybe a one-night stand?
But what unfolds before my eyes is an unbelievable reality.

This only happens in the romance fantasy novels I read while running through all my cash…

Oh, my God!
I went to sleep and woke up as Cinderella’s stepsister, a name that no one remembers!

A knight of the Royal Guard, Drake Wolfrick Persson appears before her.
“I clearly told you to not to go anywhere and wait.”

The moment the dark voice entered my ears, I became the protagonist of another story.>
